blogPost.title: The distribution of surgical masks resulted in a striking 35% drop in confirmed symptomatic cases among people aged 60 or older, in a study in Bangladesh https://t.co/VrNsrQoDLe

在孟加拉国的一项研究中，分发外科口罩使60岁或以上的人中确诊的症状性病例惊人地减少了35%，https://t.co/VrNsrQoDLe
